songs.title: You Control My Heart
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
You control my heart
So don't be an evil motherfucker
You know I'm your slave
So don't be a bad master

[Verse]
My love for you will never destroy you
My love for you will never destroy me
Oh, please always hold me

[Chorus]
You control my heart
So don't be an evil motherfucker
You know I'm your slave
So don't be a bad master

[Verse]
My love for you will never destroy you
Oh, my love for you will never destroy me
Oh, please always hold me

[Chorus]
You control my heart
So don't be an evil motherfucker
You know I'm your slave
And I will kill you in the night while you’re sleeping
While you're sleeping
While you're sleeping
I will kill you in the night while you're sleeping
